00225     const void getState(Array2D< double > &cov, Array< double > &m, unsigned &n) 
00226     {
00227       cov = covarM;
00228       m = meanM;
00229       n = countM;
00230     }
00231 
00233     void setState(Array2D< double > &cov, Array< double > &m, unsigned n) 
00234     {  
00235       covarM = cov;
00236       meanM = m;
00237       countM = n;
00238       modifiedM = true;
00239       update();
00240     }
00241 
00242 
00243   private:
00244 
00245     // If set to "true", the transformation matrix must be
00246     // updated. 
00247     bool modifiedM;
00248 
00249     // If set to "true" a matrix will be created in method
00250     // "update()", that transforms a given sequence of data
00251     // to white noise. See also documentation of 
00252     // method "setWhitening()".
00253     bool whiteningM;
00254 
00255     // If set to "true" a matrix will be created in method
00256     // "update()", that will move the data in a way, that
00257     // the mean value of the data lies in the zero-point. 
00258     bool removeMeanM;
00259 
00260     // If data used for training consists of several
00261     // vectors then a training is performed for each
00262     // single vector. This flag counts the number of
00263     // "vector" trainings that were performed.
00264     unsigned countM;
00265 
00266     // Stores information for the calculation of mean values.
00267     Array< double > meanM;
00268 
00269     // Stores information for the calculation of the covariance matrix.
00270     Array2D< double > covarM;
00271 
00272     // The transformation matrix.
00273     Array2D< double > transMatM;
00274 
00275     // Used to store the eigenvalues when calculating the 
00276     // transformation matrix.
00277     Array< double > dvecL;
